title: My Sad Story (Yasuo A+)
body:
I had a game a while ago where I was playing Yasuo (with Project skin) and I was against another Yasuo mid (with no skin) and he was gold or plat, so there would be a ton of pressure on me cuz if I do badly I'd just be some rich kid who sucks at League. The game played out and for some reason I became practically the most fed in the entire game at around 18 kills if I remember correctly (probably not but a ton). My score at the time was a perfect 18/0 and once we got to the base, they surrendered so I was like lol good game boiz and I went in 1v5 cuz Yolo right, we've won the game. So I 1v5 under their turret, obviously died in the last second before the nexus exploded, and after the game I was awarded with an A+.

Moral of the story boiz, don't do anything stupid even when you're fed af :'( would've been the most free S in my life

Edit: This ain't a boast post, everyone on their team was raging at their Yasuo cuz he was actually really bad, I just got extremely lucky

replies.body: Your KDA isnt the only thing that counts towards an S rank, Pretty much everything thing you do in said game counts towards it. like your CS, Objectives etc.

> [{quoted}](name=PuncakesssR,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=yGyn1YNO,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-22T08:43:43.764+0000)
>
> Your KDA isnt the only thing that counts towards an S rank, Pretty much everything thing you do in said game counts towards it. like your CS, Objectives etc.

My other stats were good enough for an S- at least, except for that one death/shut down.

>
> Possible the worst analogy I've read in my days

Still made me lol though xD

> [{quoted}](name=Ascalon127,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=yGyn1YNO,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-09-22T23:20:40.983+0000)
>
> Also the time period it happened in. So for example, you would have a more likelihood of S if you had 250 CS at 25 mins than 300 CS at 50 mins

Can't remember that, the game was a while ago :P
Also the time period it happened in. So for example, you would have a more likelihood of S if you had 250 CS at 25 mins than 300 CS at 50 mins

Gee i wonder why its so hard to get an s lel

League of yasuo

You were Yasuo, against another Yasuo... and you're wondering why you didn't get what you want?

If America nukes Russia, and Russia, nukes america no one wins..

Same thing applies here.

When people play Yasuo, no one wins.
